MemoryInfobox.description: After being attacked by the Followers of Ares, Herodotos suggested Kassandra investigate the Akousmatikoi Cave|island's cave.
MemoryInfobox.location: Akousmatikoi Cave, Devotee's Sanctuary, Samos, Greece

General_Description: '''Followers of Truth''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]] and a memory of Layla herself.
Section_Description: [[Herodotos]] and Kassandra decided to investigate the [[Followers of Ares]] threat.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra traveled to Akousmatikoi Cave, where Herodotos was waiting.

*'''Herodotos:''' ''I'll follow you in after you've finished...''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Killing everyone inside.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''Yes. That.''

After entering the cave, and killing 4 of the Followers, Herodotos enters.

*'''Herodotos:''' ''So this is where they've been hiding.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You were right to suggest we look here. But they've been dealt with.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''We still need to find out what they were doing here in the first place. Let's look around.''

Exploring around, she noticed a shield and some armor on the ground.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''Athenian and Spartan uniforms...''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''They could have the people of Samos believe they were attacking from either side.''

A piece of paper caught her eye.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''I didn't take the Followers of Ares to be lovers of poetry.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''They're not. This work... it's awfully close to the style Theodoros uses. Why would his writings be here?''

She found a bracelet on the ground.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''I didn't take them for the heirloom type.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''How did they... That's our family's sigil.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''They must have stolen it.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''There's no way they could have found that on their own. It was given to them.''

She went over to a parchment on a nearby table, also filed with severed body parts.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''There's a list of names here.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''I recognize these names. They're all quite influential on Samos. But... Mestor's is missing.''

She went over to a bag of coins.

*'''Kassandra:''' ''These coins aren't like any I've seen before.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''I have. They're Persian...''

Having explored enough, she went over to Herodotos.

*'''Herodotos:''' ''I'm afraid to even say what I think is going on here.''

<tabber>
|-|Samos is in danger.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll say it. Persia want to take Samos.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''I think you're right. It's close enough to places like Athens and Sparta, but small enough to not draw their attention.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Makes sense.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''Unfortunately, that's not the worst part.''

|-|I want to hear your theory.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''This island and these people are yours. Tell me what you're thinking.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''Persia wants to take control of Samos. It'd be a good staging ground for something greater.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''You're right.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''I only wish that was all there is to worry about.''

</tabber>

*'''Kassandra:''' ''What is it?''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''If Persia is involved, they couldn't have done this alone. They would have needed someone here to help them.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Someone with ties to the empire.''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''And influence on Samos, yes. Other than myself, there are only two others who could be responsible. For what's going to happen... and for what already has.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Herodotos...''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''With everything we've found... everything you've seen and heard. Please, just tell me which of them it is.''

<tabber>
|-|It's Theodoros.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's Theodoros. He's working for the Persians and brought the Followers of Ares here.''

|-|It's Mestor.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''It's Mestor. He brought the Followers of Ares here to help Persia.''

</tabber>

*'''Herodotos:''' ''I was afraid you'd say that, but I know you must be right.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''What do you want to do now?''
*'''Herodotos:''' ''I need to talk to Theodoros.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra and Herodotos traveled to [[Akousmatikoi Cave]] and discovered that [[Persia]] wanted to take hold of Samos.
Section_Trivia: *Kassandra can accuse either brother, [[Theodoros (Samian)|Theodoros]] and [[Mestor (Samian)|Mestor]], but Mestor is the culprit.
